channel.title: Slow scroll on a pointpad with two fingers
channel.description: Scrolling with two fingers on the touchpad has become less sensitive than it was on the host, there were no problems on Whonix 14 ... Is this because of the kloak tool? There is no touchpad in the mouse settings ... For scrolling, you have to put a lot of pressure on the touchpad Thanks for help.

item.title: Slow scroll on a pointpad with two fingers
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
No idea.

But might be possible to sort out as per https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Free_Support_Principle.

Read full topic
item.source: Slow scroll on a pointpad with two fingers

item.title: Slow scroll on a pointpad with two fingers
item.dc:creator: tuta
item.description:
Scrolling with two fingers on the touchpad has become less sensitive than it was on the host, there were no problems on Whonix 14 … Is this because of the kloak tool? There is no touchpad in the mouse settings …
For scrolling, you have to put a lot of pressure on the touchpad
Thanks for help.

Read full topic
